page.title: 16EDUCATION
page.content:
Hillwood Primary School in 1985 The population of the school is Primary 1 5 boys 5 girls total 10 Primary 2 5 boys 5 girls total 10 Primary 3 3 boys 2 girls total 5 Primary 4 4 boys 10 girls total 14 Primary 5 1 boy 5 girls total 6 Primary 6 5 boys 11 girls total 16 Primary 7 6 boys 7 girls total 13
Total 29 boys 45 girls total 74 The teaching staff consists of a Headteacher who teaches Primary 7 every morning,3 teachers who teach composite classes of P1 and 2,P3 and 4,P5 and 6 and a Headteacher relief who teaches P7 in the afternoon. A remedial specialist attends 2 mornings per week, a music specialist one afternoon per fortnight and a physical education specialist one morning per week.
